name: file-organizer
title: File Organizer
description: Automatically find where a file should go
author: felix_wortmann

commands.name: place-file
commands.title: Place File
commands.description: Suggests the most suitable location for a selected file based on its characteristics

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
